body_html:
Thanks for your info. but i do not know how to use this --input_saver parameter. There is no example usage for this one. and the default 4 parameters are only:

--input_graph=some_graph_def.pb
--input_checkpoint=model.ckpt-8361242
--output_graph=/tmp/frozen_graph.pb
--output_node_names=softmax

body:
Thanks for your info. but i do not know how to use this **--input_saver** parameter. There is no example usage for this one. and the default 4 parameters are only:

--input_graph=some_graph_def.pb 
--input_checkpoint=model.ckpt-8361242 
--output_graph=/tmp/frozen_graph.pb 
--output_node_names=softmax
